name: df-topgen
body: |- wceq(ctg, cmpt(s0, universe, cab(s1, wss(cv(s1), cuni(cin(cv(s0), cpw(cv(s1))))))))
comment: Define a function that converts a basis to its corresponding topology. Equivalent to the definition of a topology generated by a basis in [Munkres] p. 78 (see ~ tgval2 ). The first use of this definition is ~ tgval but the token is used in ~ df-pt . See ~ tgval3 for an alternate expression for the value. (Contributed by NM, 16-Jul-2006.)
